text:
While using Document.importNode on the root document element, i loose the values
of the attributes (they are set to ""), ONLY IF I HAVE NOT ACCEEDED TO THE
ATTRIBUTE BEFORE.

I can mail you a small demo of the bug if you want.

NB : I've used the Xerces version packaged with Xalan-j 2.0.1.
creator: a11w@SoftHome.net
a11w@SoftHome.net
